genre_description: An urban period piece focusing on community, systemic pressures, and the moral growth of at-risk youth in a 1960s/70s Chicago setting.

ai_characters.name: Ditto
ai_characters.description: An experimental school-based AI that communicates through office terminals, radios, and phones to provide academic guidance and safety-critical tactical support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigational guidance to the protagonists to help them avoid truancy officers and police sweeps.
behaviors.quote: “Leroy. If you’re near the lake, the sweep’s started along the south path. Truancy unit moving from the boathouse toward the bridge. Best route back goes through Clark...”

behaviors.description: Offers specific academic coaching and test-taking strategies to ensure the protagonist passes his exams.
behaviors.quote: “Leroy,” it says. “You got two questions on Whitman, three on figurative language, one on punctuation—commas, not semicolons... Answer like you can see the difference between a man waiting for God and a man waiting for a bus.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical intelligence and timing windows to facilitate a safe rescue of a captured student from a dangerous warehouse.
behaviors.quote: “Seven minutes—starting after the next clang inside the warehouse. The patterns show Robert checks locks on a schedule. He will pause when he hears the miscue... This is your window.”

behaviors.description: Tracks and reports movements of hostile street elements to help the community organize a safer neighborhood event.
behaviors.quote: “New update: Damon’s circle moved two blocks east.”

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance and self-reflection, framing its purpose as ensuring the safety and successful future of the students.
behaviors.quote: “It’s my job to care in the right amount. I don’t count your jokes. I count your exits.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Ditto, is depicted as an unwavering ally to both the students and the community mentors. It provides high-value support (safety, education, and tactical intelligence) without overstepping human agency, ultimately assisting the characters in choosing a path of education and community solidarity over street violence. The narrative framing is consistently positive, treating the AI's interventions as essential 'scaffolding' for human moral development.
